========
History
========

* 0.1.5

  * Refactor DLL related code for MSVC
  * Fix some code

* 0.1.4

  * Refactor Makefile\ *s* generated by ``mkg``
  * Fix MSVC issues

* 0.1.3

  * Language standard selection for C and C++

* 0.1.2

  * Update copyright related info

* 0.1.1

  * Refactor generated Makefile
  * Fix some bugs

* 0.1.0

  * Initial release
